H3.text: who performed the halftime show at super bowl 51. Lady Gaga

A4.text: On November 23, 2014, the NFL announced that Perry would perform at the Super Bowl XLIX halftime show on February 1, 2015.

A5.text: Lady Gaga opened the halftime show with a combination of 'God Bless America' and 'This Land Is Your Land'.
